findcast

FindCast is a one-stop-shop personal assistant to help you get weather information, find a local restaurant within your city, find and book a hotel, find your postal code and many many more.

It is simple to use and it does not retain your personal information. So, you can rest assure that your personal information will not be sold to third parties.
